scenario.name: register_client
scenario.send: REGISTER sip:127.0.0.1 SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: <sip:[field0]@[field1]>;tag=[call_number] To: <sip:[field0]@[field1]> Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: [cseq] REGISTER Contact: sip:[field0]@[local_ip]:[local_port] Max-Forwards: 10 Expires: 120 User-Agent: SIPp/Win32 Content-Length: 0

REGISTER sip:127.0.0.1 SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: <sip:[field0]@[field1]>;tag=[call_number] To: <sip:[field0]@[field1]> Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: [cseq] REGISTER Contact: [$1] Max-Forwards: 10 Expires: 120 User-Agent: SIPp/Win32 Content-Length: 0
